Text: This was by the far best song they did "Icicle Works - Little Girl Lost" anyone want it just drop me a line

80zforever You are awesome...I am taking a liberty with your 80's collection, painting out the pops and scratches... I rarely use automated cleaning software....when it is finished I wil let you know...as an aside last year I was commisioned to video Chris Layhe (the bassist)doing some solo acoustic stuf including Icicle Works stuff up here in Yorkshire , England...
regards and keep up the good work..
Forgeit thx for the kind words. Let me know how the cleaning software did. Normally they make the sound so unnatural. cheers
awesome. have this on cassette. thanks

Thanks!!

Im stunned...
Now a song that I would like to hear is "the Atheist" by Icicle works. If you have it upload it please!
